text:
Sherri M. Saum (born October 1, 1974) is an American actress. Saum is best known for her role as Lena Adams Foster in the Freeform drama series "The Fosters" (2013–18). She was born in Dayton, Ohio.
Saum is also known for her television roles in "Beggars and Choosers", "Rescue Me" and "In Treatment", as well as for her roles in the daytime soap operas "Sunset Beach" and "One Life to Live".
